meanings.definition: Relating to or expressed in percentages.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the percental increase in a simple way.
meanings.sent2: She calculated the percental value of the discount.
meanings.sent3: The percental cake recipe made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His percental effort in the project was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The percental representation on the graph was easy to understand.

meanings.sent1: The percental of students who passed the test was high.
meanings.sent2: He received a large percental of the profits.
meanings.sent3: The percental of chocolate chips in the cookie was perfect.
meanings.sent4: She owned a small percental of the company.
meanings.sent5: The percental of rainfall this month was unusually low.
